short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Pomodoro timer to keep ypu focused and notify you to take breaks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and easy pomodoro timer to keep you focused and notify you to take breaks. If you are a fan of simple UI then this is for you. It has start, pause, reset time features.
